text:
goodlord.co | Scala, PHP, Typescript/React Engineers | London, UK | Full Time, ONSITE | https://goodlord.co/careers

Goodlord exists to streamline the lettings process for agents, landlords and tenants in the UK.

Based in Aldgate East, Goodlord is a great work environment with plenty of scope for personal and professional development.

We're hiring at various levels of experience so get in touch!

nick+hn@goodlord.co
